item.title: Space
item.description: 那些数字化转型很棒的银行，为什么渐渐让人生厌 成本费用分析报告

long sun is an ICT veteran with a passion for open source. He has a solid experience in the telecommunication and information technology industry for more than 17 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country OSS/BSS platforms/systems and operation tools, most of them are still running in productions. He loves open source and has been contributing to a variety of open source projects, including Istio(Service
